title: Rivals of Rebirth - Novel Updates
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Economics   Enemies Become Allies   Enemies Become Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Inferiority Complex   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Power Couple   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Seme Protagonist   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters   Yandere
author: Song Yang   宋央
description:
There is always such a person in the world, his family background is better than yours, his status is higher than yours, while you work hard and think all the way up, but with just a wave of his hand, you are wiped out. What is even more sad is that he doesn't even know who you are.

Zheng Jue met Han Jin like this but he didn't realize this truth until he died. In the end, he had found the wrong opponent and ultimately lost his life.>
